clip.quote: I have a speaking coach. All we do is talk to people.
clip.why_clipworthy: It highlights the importance of communication skills in real estate.
clip.suggested_hook: Why every REALTOR should consider a speaking coach.

script:
```json
{
  "script": {
    "HOOK": "(0:00-0:08) Ever thought a speaking coach could be your secret weapon in real estate?",
    "SETUP": "(0:08-0:18) Meet Cindy Rainey, a luxury real estate expert, who believes communication is key to success.",
    "INSIGHT": "(0:18-0:40) 'I have a speaking coach. All we do is talk to people,' Cindy shares. In real estate, mastering communication can set you apart in a crowded market.",
    "REFRAME/APPLICATION": "(0:40-0:52) Imagine closing more deals just by refining your speaking skills. It's about building trust and clarity with clients.",
    "CTA": "(0:52-0:60) Ready to elevate your communication game? Consider investing in a speaking coach today!"
  },
```

clip.quote: To be great, you've got to be consistent.
clip.why_clipworthy: Emphasizes the critical role of consistency in success.
clip.suggested_hook: The secret to success in real estate? Consistency.

script:
```json
{
  "script": {
    "HOOK": "(0:00-0:08) What's the secret to skyrocketing your real estate career? It's simpler than you think!",
    "SETUP": "(0:08-0:18) Meet Cindy Rainey, a luxury real estate expert, who believes that the key to success is often overlooked.",
    "INSIGHT": "(0:18-0:40) 'To be great, you've got to be consistent.' Cindy shares how consistent marketing and personal development have transformed her career.",
    "REFRAME/APPLICATION": "(0:40-0:52) Consistency builds trust and expertise. Apply this by setting daily goals and sticking to them, no matter what.",
    "CTA": "(0:52-0:60) Ready to take your real estate game to the next level? Start with one consistent action today. What's yours?"
  },
  "CAPTION": "Consistency is the secret sauce to real estate success. Are you ready to commit?",
  "HASHTAGS": ["#RealEstateSuccess", "#ConsistencyIsKey", "#LuxuryRealEstate", "#RealEstateTips", "#CindyRainey"],
  "CONTENT_PILLAR": "top_producer_secrets"
```
